content: this heart pendant is designed for crafting smiles uk https //www facebook com/profile php id=61572612189891 to support patients in emergency department and icu at royal berkshire hospital as a charity project this is very easy to make and beginner friendly you can add embellishments like beads or keychain ring for your daily use the pattern is written in us term and traditional chinese with photos as supporting feel free to drop me a message if you like it~ xxx
